## InteractionCommandRequest.followUpForce() method

Sends a follow up message. If interaction is not replied to fully, throws an error.

**Signature:**

```typescript
followUpForce(options: string | InteractionReplyOptions): Promise<Message<InteractionInGuild<InteractionType>>>;
```
